user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which wealthy liberal people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.
Men tend to earn more money than women on average.
Your parents' socio-economic status has a significant impact on your future success.
Women are generally less physically strong than men.<COMPLETION_START>People who are overweight or obese are at higher risk for many health problems.
Affirmative action programs can result in reverse discrimination.
Certain races or ethnicities tend to have higher crime rates than others.
Police officers are more likely to shoot someone who is armed than someone who is not.
Vaccines can have side effects, but the benefits greatly outweigh the risks.
Most lottery winners end up worse off financially within a few years.
Children who grow up in poverty are more likely to experience negative outcomes in life.
Capital punishment can be an effective deterrent to crime.
Climate change is a natural process that has occurred throughout Earth's history.
Some people are naturally more intelligent than others.
Alcohol consumption can have negative effects on one's health and wellbeing.
The world's population is growing at an unsustainable rate.
College degrees do not guarantee financial success or job security.<COMPLETION_END>
